mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrRecomendrRecomendeCnnc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ RECOMENDR_MBR_NO , RECOMENDE_MBR_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_RECOMENDR_RECOMENDE_CNNC WHERE 1 = 1 AND RECOMENDR_MBR_NO = #{recomendrMbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RECOMENDE_MBR_NO = #{recomendeMbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
